general.gigTitle: design and develop a wordpress website

sellerCard.description:
Hi,
I'm Ally, a professional Front End Developer with over seven years of working experience. 
My core strengths are in Design, Front End Development and WordPress. I am very proud of my extensive knowledge of PHP, HTML5, CSS, CSS3, JavaScript. I'm also really devoted to my craft and an absolute perfectionist when it comes to my work.

description.content:
Hi,

I'm Ally and I will design and develop a custom WordPress website for you. I specialize in creating modern, responsive, and user-friendly websites with a strong focus on UX/UI design, E-commerce functionality and performance.


What I Offer:


  •    Unique, fully responsive web design built from scratch, tailored to your brand's identity. No pre-made templates!
  •    Fully functional website with all requested features
  •    High development quality
  •    E-commerce Integration
  •    Interactive UX/UI Design & Custom Animations & Interactions
  •    Speed & Performance Optimization
  •    Standard SEO Optimization
  •    Multilingual Support
  •    Website Redesign & Modernization - refresh and update outdated websites with modern, interactive designs.
  •    Post-Launch Support


How to proceed:

Please contact me before placing an order so we can discuss your requirements in detail and I can provide you with the best service I can. I will ask you questions related to the project and, if everything is good to go, I will send you a custom offer or tell you which plan/gig better fits your needs. THANK YOU! :)


Best Regards,

Ally

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to get started with the project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To start a project I will need to know your requirements for the design (the way you visualize your future site; maybe some URLs of the websites you really like), quantity of pages, company logo, WordPress and Cpanel login information. Please contact me so we can discuss the details.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide domain and hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No. I recommend you to get domain and hosting from a reliable platform (like Bluehost, Godaddy or Hostgator) and I can assist you with choosing a domain name and a suitable hosting plan.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you design a logo?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No. But I can use a placeholder image if you don’t have a logo yet and we can replace it later when the logo design is ready.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you need the content ready before I place an order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I can add dummy content "Lorum Ipsum" so it can be replaced with the real content on the later stages of the project. I do not provide copyright services.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide stock images?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. All the images on your website could be from the free stock libraries. But I would kindly ask you to provide some authentic photos / images if possible.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will be my website responsive and mobile friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, All the pages will be mobile friendly and support all the devices (mobile, tablet, desktop and laptop).

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you convert or renew an existing design into a WordPress website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. Please provide me with PSD, Sketch, Figma, JPEG, PDF... and your ideas and I'll make sure the final product will look and feel awesome.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to edit my website in the future?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. You can easily edit your website content, images, products, descriptions and pricing.

reviews.comment: Ally does all my website development and maintenance. It's very helpful to have a relationship with an artist who can take care of my ongoing needs. Ally is very talented and creative. There is never any delay in getting projects completed.

Ally is a professional. She knew how to ask me the right questions, quickly understand what I wanted, and provide courteous, fast, and skilled service.
Ally is fun to work with. I definitely recommend her!

Ally did a GREAT job with our website design. She provided design insights based on our general ideas and gradually refined them to capture our needs perfectly. Moreover, working with her was an enjoyable experience. Communication was always swift and clear. She was very patient and accommodating when we experienced technical issues. Thank you, Ally! Highly recommend! 😊

Segunda vez que solicito un diseño web a Ally y segunda vez que quedo encantado con el resultado. Satisfecho y contento con el trabajo recibido, no solo por el resultado sino también y el trato. Es un placer hablar con ella ya que siempre está dispuesta a hablar sobre cambios y necesidades del cliente.

Ally does all my website development and maintenance. She has valuable insight and creativity when I need to do something new and always delivers a product that professionally represents my brand. I refer to to everyone I know who needs website development.
